Record.ClassificationPath: Neoplasms/Neoplasms by Site/Endocrine Gland Neoplasms/Paraneoplastic Endocrine Syndromes
Endocrine System Diseases/Endocrine Gland Neoplasms/Paraneoplastic Endocrine Syndromes
Record.Description: Syndromes resulting from inappropriate production of HORMONES or hormone-like materials by NEOPLASMS in non-endocrine tissues or not by the usual ENDOCRINE GLANDS. Such hormone outputs are called ectopic hormone (HORMONES, ECTOPIC) secretion.
